metadata.title: CVE-2018-12179 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Improper configuration in system firmware for EDK II may allowunauthenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege,information disclosure and/or denial of service via local access.

criterions.comment: edk2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
